channel.title: RSPSoft; RS2D
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b] Welcome to the newest project I am currently doing with a team, the main holders of this project are Lin and Ikram, I am just developing the Rs2DV server and Client to their standards. I just want to let you know about this development and what we are looking to add to the private server in the next few days. [b]Features[/b] We have currently added a lot of things to the server that no other Rs2DV server has. Not many Rs2DV server have player saving, we do!
- Started basic quest system - Optimized equipment type system - Added/fixed all skill menu item thumbnails - Fixed potion drink - working RuneScript parser - Added some more weapon sidebar interfaces - Added friends list loading and saving - primitive combat system - rewrote all of cooking - Weapon interfaces are no longer repeatitively sent when unchanged - Made buttons reset upon login - Working Jaggrab server - Added downtime-less updates - Added configuration via INI file
- NPCs are loaded at startup from file - Randomly move every so often - They won't wander away from regions (i.e. fixed a bug) - Most NPC packets are there for your convienience - Fully working bank system, pretty much flawless - Both bag to bank, and bank to bag - Working insert/swapping of items - Withdraw as item OR note [b]Pictures[/b] Player rendering + Design [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/untitled-2.jpg[/img] Interfaces for wepons [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/rs2dv1.jpg[/img] NPC Spawning + Basic combat [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/rs2d2.jpg[/img] Teleporting [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/rs2dv3.jpg[/img] [b]Update Log[/b] [i]23.06.2009:[/i] I have asked the moparscape moderator "Archer" for permission to start a development team, hopefully this will be accepted and we can make a better server for people to play. I'd Like to thanks the following members. [b]Verak Hidendra M.dog311 Lin _Ikram[/b]

item.title: RSPSoft; RS2D
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

This looks like rs2dbase as pointed out to me by someone else. Are you going to give the appropriate credits or prove that it is not rs2dbase? Your previous ‘works’ (i.e. the RuneFusion copy) have been dubious.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPSoft; RS2D
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

[quote=“the hunt”]like i said before,
i would love to help with development,
weather its graphics or coding[/quote]
We will not accept any members that we have not seen produce some high standard work, this development can be considered serious and we have not got permission from the staff yet to start a development team, once our IRC is set up then we will have discussions about the avaiable positions for the team.

Read full topic

sweetness this will be so epic!

Read full topic

item.title: RSPSoft; RS2D
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

primadude:

Development teams Always die.

This development will not die, so far I have added a lot of stuff to the private server, just haven’t had time to update the update log.

The client has been created also, I need to add some features but there will not be any kind of models added to the private server yet, I will only add when I find a better way of doing so.

jmood128:

Efilite you should take the combat from killamesses dovolution and add it to this that would make this the most epic server ever

We are not going to use any wL code, we have a working combat system but it is not up to a high standard yet, I will not be working on this in till we have all of the features set up, then I will concentrate on making the features better and more accurate.

Read full topic
